author: Mike Calhoun, Jim Parrott and Mark Zandi for CNN Business Perspectives
title: Opinion: Trump administration may turn a health crisis into a housing crisis
description: Congress recently did the right thing by giving Americans suffering under the economic impact of the coronavirus a big break on their mortgage payments. If you've lost your job or seen a drop in your income because of the virus, and your mortgage is backed by…
content: Mike Calhoun is the president of the Center for Responsible Lending. Jim Parrott is non-resident fellow at the Urban Institute and co-owner of Parrott Ryan Advisors, which provides strategic advice on housing finance issues. Some of his clients are companies … [+3746 chars]
